00087 #ifndef _NT_ERROR_OBJ_H_
00088 #define _NT_ERROR_OBJ_H_
00089 
00090  
00091 #include <iostream>
00092 #include <cstdlib>
00093 
00094 
00095 #include "nt_main.h"
00096 #include "nt_types.h"
00097 #include "nt_obj.h"
00098 
00100 class NT_error_o : public NT_o
00101 {
00102 public:
00103   NT_error_o(const char* f, int l, const char* expr = 0, const char* msg = 0);
00104 void abort();
00105 virtual void message(ostream&) const;
00106 
00107 private:
00108   const char* _file;
00109   int _line;
00110   const char* _expr;
00111   const char* _msg;
00112 };
00113 
00114 /*-------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00115 
00118 class NT_bounds_error_o : public NT_error_o
00119 {
00120 public:
00121    NT_bounds_error_o(const char* f, int l, int i, int lo, int hi);
00122    virtual void message(ostream&) const;
00123 private:
00124    int _actual;
00125    int _low;
00126    int _high;
00127 };
00128 
00130 class NT_dimension_error_o : public NT_error_o 
00131 {
00132  public:
00133     NT_dimension_error_o(const char* f, int l, int left, int right);
00134     virtual void message(ostream&) const;
00135  private:
00136     int _left;
00137     int _right;
00138 };
00139 
00140 /*-------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00141 
00142 class NT_precond_error_o : public NT_error_o
00144 {
00145 public:
00146    NT_precond_error_o(const char* f, int l, const char* expr);
00147 };
00148 
00149 /*-------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00150 
00151 class NT_postcond_error_o : public NT_error_o
00154 {
00155 public:
00156    NT_postcond_error_o(const char* f, int l, const char* expr);
00157 };
00158 
00159 /*-------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00160 
00161 class NT_invariant_error_o : public NT_error_o
00165 {
00166 public:
00167    NT_invariant_error_o(const char* f, int l, const char* expr);
00168 };
00169 
00170 /*-------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00171 
00172 class NT_mem_error_o : public NT_error_o
00175 {
00176 public:
00177    NT_mem_error_o(const char* f, int l, const char* expr);
00178 };

00180 
00181 
00182 #ifdef NT_THROW_ERRORS
00183 #define NT_THROW(E) (throw E)
00184 #else
00185 #define NT_THROW(E) (E.abort())
00186 #endif
00187 
00188 #define NT_ASSERT(E) ((E) ? (void)0 : NT_THROW(NT_error_o(__FILE__, __LINE__, #E)))
00189 #define NT_ASSERT_PRECOND(E) ((E) ? (void)0 : NT_THROW(NT_precond_error_o(__FILE__, __LINE__, #E)))
00190 #define NT_ASSERT_POSTCOND(E) ((E) ? (void)0 : NT_THROW(NT_postcond_error_o(__FILE__, __LINE__, #E)))
00191 #define NT_ASSERT_INVARIANT(E) ((E) ? (void)0 : NT_THROW(NT_invariant_error_o(__FILE__, __LINE__, #E)))
00192 #define NT_ASSERT_MEM(E) ((E) ? (void)0 : NT_THROW(NT_mem_error_o(__FILE__, __LINE__, #E)))
00193 #define NT_ASSERT_BOUNDS(I, L, H) (NT_CheckBounds(__FILE__, __LINE__, I, L, H))
00194 #define NT_ASSERT_DIM(L, R) (NT_CheckDimension(__FILE__, __LINE__, L, R))
00195 
00196 extern void NT_CheckBounds(const char* f, int l, int i, int lo, int hi);
00197 extern void NT_CheckDimension(const char* f, int l, int leftDim, int rightDim);
00198 
00199 #endif /* _NT_ERROR_OBJ_H_ */
